string.name: billing_unavailable
string.description: An error message if the billing service is unavailable

string.name: billing_dev_error
string.description: An error message if Billing APIs were implemented incorrectly

resources.string: The Billing APIs were incorrectly called

string.name: billing_error
string.description: An error message if Billing APIs stopped due to an error

resources.string: An error occurred when calling Billing APIs

string.name: billing_unsupported_feature
string.description: An error message if an unsupported feature is called

string.name: billing_item_owned
string.description: An error message if the requested item was previously purchased

resources.string: Item is already owned by user

string.name: billing_item_not_owned
string.description: An error message if the requested item isn't owned by the user

string.name: billing_item_unavailable
string.description: An error message if the requested item isn't available

string.name: billing_network_error
string.description: An error message if a network error occurred

resources.string: Billing request failed due to network error

string.name: billing_service_disconnect
string.description: An error message if the Billing Service disconnected

string.name: billing_service_unavailable
string.description: An error message if the Billing Service is unavailable

string.name: billing_user_cancel
string.description: An error message if the user cancelled the request
